org.bytedeco.javacpp

Class opencv_objdetect.DepthNormal

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    opencv_objdetect

    public static class opencv_objdetect.DepthNormal
extends opencv_objdetect.Modality
    \brief Modality that computes quantized surface normals from a dense depth map.

      • opencv_objdetect.DepthNormal

        public opencv_objdetect.DepthNormal(int distance_threshold,
                            int difference_threshold,
                            long num_features,
                            int extract_threshold)
        \brief Constructor. \param distance_threshold Ignore pixels beyond this distance. \param difference_threshold When computing normals, ignore contributions of pixels whose depth difference with the central pixel is above this threshold. \param num_features How many features a template must contain. \param extract_threshold Consider as candidate feature only if there are no differing orientations within a distance of extract_threshold.
